titleStmt.title: The devils cabinet-councell. Discovered or the mistery and iniquity of the good old cause. Laying open all the plots and contrivances of O. Cromwell, and the Long Parliament, in order to the taking avvay the life of his late Sacred Maiesty of blessed memory.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. Brugis for Hen. Marsh at the Princes Armes in Chancery-lane neer Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Princes Armes in Chancery-lane neer Fleet-street
